description: AgentKit core hooks: markdown formatting, skill suggestions, and quality gate

hooks.prompt: After completing this tool use, briefly consider: Would any installed AgentKit skill be a helpful next step? Only suggest if genuinely relevant to what just happened. Do not suggest if the user is mid-workflow or if no skill clearly applies. If suggesting, mention the skill naturally (e.g., '/finalize to run the completion workflow').

Evaluate whether Claude should stop. Context: $ARGUMENTS

Check: (1) Were all user-requested tasks completed? (2) Are there unaddressed errors or lint issues from changes made? (3) Were any TODO/FIXME comments left that need attention?

Respond with JSON: {"ok": true} if Claude can stop, or {"ok": false, "reason": "explanation of what still needs to be done"} if work remains.
